markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Trickster Tengu](/Feats.aspx?ID=5692) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 37 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure. Once per day, you can cast either [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1437) or [_cursed metamorphosis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1479) as a 7th-rank primal innate spell. You must take the form of a bird when casting this _aerial form_.
name: Trickster Tengu
